name: The One-Armed Bandit
description:
The One Armed Bandit has one last job planned before he retires, the heist of the century.  He must sneak through the floors of the San Una Bank while avoiding detection from the guards, cameras, and body scanners.  

Use WASD / Arrow Keys to move, left click to attack with the knife, and right click to throw your held item.  Collect all gems while avoiding detection and return them to your bag to complete each level.  

This game was created with for the GMTK 2019 Game Jam, with the theme Only One.  In this game, your character has Only One Arm / Inventory Slot.
